tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lighting_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    light_intensity INT NOT NULL,
    repeat_weekdays TEXT[] NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE lighting_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  intensity INT,
  days_active VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LightingSchedule (
  schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  end_time TIME NOT NULL,
  days_of_week VARCHAR[] NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  preferred_start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  preferred_end_time TIME NOT NULL,
  preferred_brightness INT NOT NULL,
  notification_enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE LightingSchedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  light_intensity INT
);

CREATE TABLE RoomLayout (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name STRING,
    number_of_lights INT,
    light_location STRING,
    light_intensity INT
);

CREATE TABLE LightingLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES UserPreferences(user_id),
    room_id INT REFERENCES RoomLayout(room_id),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_details STRING
);
